Subject:  Design 
Software:  Color 
Author:  Justin Seeley 

The world is full of inspiring color combinations. With Adobe Color, you can explore color in a whole new way, using new tools, an active online community, and even the camera on your iPhone, iPad, or Android device. The color themes you create are automatically saved to Creative Cloud Libraries: to use in your designs, layouts, and illustrations or to share with other designers.â€¨â€¨Join Justin Seeley as he explores the essential features of Adobe Color. He shows how to create themes using the online color wheel, edit themes with color rules, participate in the Adobe Color community, and use your themes in Illustrator and Photoshop. He also shows how to turn photos into color themes with the Adobe Capture mobile app.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Creating a basic theme in Adobe Color
	â€¢	Exploring color rules
	â€¢	Editing color themes
	â€¢	Removing themes from a library
	â€¢	Creating a theme from an existing image or with your camera
	â€¢	Using Adobe Color in Illustrator and Photoshop
